entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as the one who has not earned Harry's anger. He takes responsibility for Sirius' death and admits that he was not open with Harry.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as a brave, clever, and energetic man who died due to Dumbledore's fault.

relationships.description: Dumbledore caused Sirius' death by not being open with Harry.
